EmailTemplate.name: Channel Newsletter 10.1.20.Newsletter 10.1.20
EmailTemplate.subject: eWeekly –Tableside Ordering and Payments with Aloha
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
October 1, 2020 Tableside Ordering and Payments with Aloha During the last NCR Hospitality Channel Partner Enablement call on September 25, 2020, we introduced the evolution of NCR Aloha, which includes the latest on tableside ordering and payments, as well as Aloha deployment models. Check out the recording <[[https://email.ncr.com/kB0x00A00v002Qx0020s00Y]]> if you missed it.
Please join us for another informative Channel Partner Enablement call on Friday, October 9, 2020 at 1:30 pm ET. There’s always something new to learn, so you don’t want to miss it! Register in advance here <[[https://email.ncr.com/eA00tY02000QBu0002x000x]]>.
TechFest 2020 – Save The Date!
Mark your calendar now for TechFest 2020 that will take place on November 10-13, 2020. This year’s event will be completely virtual. That’s right, no need to travel!
Stay tuned for more conference details and registration information. We look forward to seeing you (virtually) this year!
